image-watermark.name: Online Image Watermark Tool
image-watermark.desc: Free local image watermark tool. Batch add text or logo watermarks and export all images as a ZIP.

seo.title: Free Online Image Watermark Tool with Batch Export
seo.summary: Add text or logo watermarks locally in your browser. Batch edit multiple images and download them together as a ZIP for better privacy.
features: Batch watermark multiple images with a single setup
Drag to position, resize, rotate, and adjust opacity or radius
Local processing keeps your images private
Free to use with instant export

faq.q: Can I watermark multiple images at once?
faq.a: Yes. Upload multiple images, configure the watermark once, and export them together.

faq.q: Does it support text and logo watermarks?
faq.a: Yes, both text and image/logo watermarks are supported with full controls.

faq.q: How can I export the results?
faq.a: Export a single image or download all watermarked images as a ZIP.

faq.q: Are images uploaded to a server?
faq.a: No. Processing happens locally in your browser for better privacy.

ui.upload: Click or drag to upload images
